text: The 2025 BWF World Championships is a badminton tournament which will be held in Paris, France. ==Host city selection== Paris was awarded the event in November 2018 during the announcement of 18 major badminton event hosts from 2019 to 2025. ==References== Category:BWF World Championships Category:International sports competitions hosted by France Category:Badminton tournaments in France Category:Sport in Paris BWF World Championships BWF World
title: 2025 BWF World Championships
